c74object.name: seq.8sequence~

attribute.name: s/offset
attribute.digest: Shifts the sequence after scaling according to high and low

attribute.name: s/low
attribute.digest: Sets the lower bound of sequence.

attribute.name: s/high
attribute.digest: Sets the upper bound of the sequence

attribute.name: s/stepsize
attribute.digest: Shifts the sequence after scaling according to high and low

attribute.name: s/sustain
attribute.digest: Determines what the object outputs when the signal value at the first inlet is 0. If enabled, the sequence value corresponding to the last non-zero signal value is held at the output. If disabled, 0. is output.

c74object.description: There are 9 sets of the four attributes listed below. The ones without a number, such as s/stepsize are global and will affect all of the sequences, while those that include a number, such as s/1/1stepsize control a single sequence.
